columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the repository

columns.name: domain_name
columns.description: The name of the domain that contains the repository.

columns.name: administrator_account
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that manages the repository.

columns.name: domain_owner
columns.description: The 12-digit account number of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the repository. It does not include dashes or spaces.

columns.name: external_connections
columns.description: An array of external connections associated with the repository.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: An CodeArtifact resource policy that contains a resource ARN, document details, and a revision.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the contents of the resource-based policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: repository_endpoint
columns.description: A string that specifies the URL of the returned endpoint.

columns.name: upstreams
columns.description: A list of upstream repositories to associate with the repository.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the resource.
